lyrics.text:
Ko e tu’unga pe taha,
‘A Sīsū Kalaisi,
Ko e tu’unga totonu,
Ki hono Siasi.

Kuo tuku ‘i Saione,
‘E hotau ‘Otua,
Pea ko e unga’anga,
Ki he laumālie.

Pea ‘e ‘ikai fa’a tuku,
‘E ha toko taha,
He tu’unga kehe ‘e taha
Ki he kakai tui.

Ko e maka mu’a ia,
Ta’engaueue,
Ko e unga’anga ma’u pē,
Ki he halaia.
